name: rewind (itch) (Sergi Lazaro)
description:
This game was made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 27.

Pause, rewind and resume the movement of circles, in order to accumulate 10 seconds of *forward* movement among them. That is, if a circle goes forward, it adds time, if it goes backward, it subtracts time. Circles stop when they collide with each other.

Click on a circle: pause/rewind/resume (depending on the icon on it).

Right click: rewind (when possible).

(Source code at https://github.com/sergilazaro/rewind )
